text: is a railway station on the Gotōji Line in Iizuka, Fukuoka, Japan, operated by Kyushu Railway Company (JR Kyushu). ==Lines== Kami-Mio Station is served by the Gotōji Line. ==Adjacent stations== ==See also== * List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1902
title: Kami-Mio Station
